CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Athleisure?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Athleisure is arc {High Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Athleisure?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Athleisure is arc {Streetwear}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {High Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from High Fashion to Athleisure in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Athleisure to High Fashion in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Athleisure and Streetwear in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Athleisure and Streetwear is {378}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Streetwear and High Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Streetwear and High Fashion is {64}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Athleisure?
SC.A: The total flow output from Athleisure is {830}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Athleisure?
SC.A: The total flow input by Athleisure is {1159}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 596? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {787} from {Athleisure} to {High Fashion}, a flow of {781} from {High Fashion} to {Athleisure}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 221? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {43} from {Athleisure} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {64} from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 53 and 596? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {378} from {Streetwear} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {64} from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion}, a flow of {411} from {High Fashion} to {Streetwear}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Streetwear to Athleisure or from Athleisure to Streetwear?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {Athleisure} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from High Fashion to Streetwear, from Streetwear to Athleisure, or from Athleisure to Streetwear?
NC.A: The flow from {High Fashion} to {Streetwear} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {High Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Athleisure} and {High Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Streetwear, Arc High Fashion, Arc Athleisure}.
